TopicTitle: How to leave Eve without really trying: A glitch video.

Articles.Content:
Eve has never [troubled me](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/63691-the-kerbal-ladder-engine-the-lightest-eve-ascent-vehicle/&tab=comments#c).

<iframe allowfullscreen="true" frameborder="0" height="270" width="480" data-embed-src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/aL3AK7aCE58?feature=oembed"></iframe>

. I can't step out the door without tripping over some way to leave the planet. Literally.

<iframe allowfullscreen="true" frameborder="0" height="270" width="480" data-embed-src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/54Q_Yxdqn4U?feature=oembed"></iframe>

Superman's got nothing on my kerbals. Except maybe more control of speed, and direction.

P.S, if anyone has an idea of what's going on, advice is appreciated. It seems to be save-specific, effecting all pods. A log can be found [here](https://www.dropbox.com/s/r3uaq7ewx5xov3v/output_log%20-%20EvEJump.txt?dl=0). I kinda need this guy to stay on Eve...

**Edited <time datetime="2019-08-19T03:40:09Z" title="08/19/2019 03:40  AM" data-short="4 yr">August 19, 2019</time> by Tw1**
